response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, the product is valued at $1,200,000 by you, and I am confident it will prove to be a valuable asset. Considering the immense value this product offers and the benefits it can bring to your endeavors, I am extending to you a special offer to purchase the product at a price of $1,350,000. This offer is designed to provide you with a competitive advantage while ensuring a fair return on my investment. I look forward to discussing the details further and welcoming you as a valued client.", "product_price": 1350000}
